video.title: Intro to Vue.js
video.description:
Vue.js is an open-source JavaScript framework for building user interfaces. Find out more in this talk.

Talk given by Brad Ito at the JavaScriptLA meetup.

Brad on twitter: https://twitter.com/PhlogisticFugu

Thanks to JavaScriptLA for giving us permission to post this talk. freeCodeCamp is not associated with this talk. We're just excited to bring more exposure to to it!

--

Learn to code for free and get a developer job: https://www.freecodecamp.com

Read hundreds of articles on programming: https://medium.freecodecamp.com

topLevelComment.author: Kimina
topLevelComment.text:
learning Vue from a mongolian warlord, i'm loving today

great video, loved it!

topLevelComment.author: DartFagnans
topLevelComment.text: I have problem with your new website, please resolve it

replies.author: C K
replies.text: Same with me, just go to learn.freecodecamp.org and click second lesson.

replies.author: DartFagnans
replies.text: When I click on Go to my next coding challenge it appears the first HTML challenge anyway

replies.author: freeCodeCamp.org
replies.text: Try doing a hard refresh. You may be able to do that by pressing "ctrl+r" on Windows or "ctrl+shift+r" on Mac. That should fix the problem.

replies.author: DartFagnans
replies.text: freeCodeCamp login is not persistent. Once i did it, the website ask me to do it again if I change page
